DOC.brief_summary: Double-blind, randomized placebo-controlled study in type 2 diabetes and dyslipidemic patients.Patients will be randomized to one of four treatment arms for 16 weeks: placebo, fenofibrate, metformin, or metformin and fenofibrate combination.
DOC.brief_title: Fenofibrate and Metformin Insulin Sensitivity in Type 2 Diabetics Study
DOC.criteria: Patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus and dyslipidemia. Type 1 diabetes.
